name: DFF NT: 3rd Appearance Special Set for Cloud & Squall
detailed_description:
Allows Cloud Strife and Squall Leonhart to equip the following items.

* Cloud Strife
- Sky-Soarer I (Appearance)
- Sky-Soarer II (Appearance)
- Sky-Soarer III (Appearance)
- Buster Sword (KH) (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* Squall Leonhart
- Sleeping Lion I (Appearance)
- Sleeping Lion II (Appearance)
- Sleeping Lion III (Appearance)
- Sleeping Lion (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

* If you are playing DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, you must first purchase the Cloud Strife and Squall Leonhart Starter Packs before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
